channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- Kantech EntraPass Corporate Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- Kantech EntraPass Corporate Edition

item.title: CVE-2019-7589|2024-08-04T20:54:28.476Z -- johnson%20controls -- kantech%20entrapass%20corporate%20edition
item.description: A vulnerability with the SmartService API Service option exists whereby an unauthorized user could potentially exploit this to upload malicious code to the server that could be executed at system level privileges. This affects Johnson Controls' Kantech EntraPass Corporate Edition versions 8.0 and prior; Kantech EntraPass Global Edition versions 8.0 and prior.
